overview: Workplace politics, office drama, supervisor power trips, it’s all enough to make you say, ‘My Boss Is A Dick.’ But, when co-worker dynamics get settled with unbridled raw sex between sexy subordinates and meaty managers, you’ll be saying, take that boss’ dick. Even if these studs are thinking, ‘My Boss Is A Dick,’ they show you how they do whatever it takes to keep their jobs.
title: My Boss is A Dick
